changeSet.sql: create table mechanic_work_list ( mechanic_id int, work_list_id int, constraint mechanic_work_list_pk primary key (mechanic_id, work_list_id), constraint mechanic_pk foreign key (mechanic_id) references mechanic (mechanic_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, constraint work_list_pk foreign key (work_list_id) references work_list (work_list_id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
